cleaned_text: - 2oz Helps ground and replenish ones energy. This fresh scent promotes harmony and dispels negativity. All the benefits of your home oil diffuser, but in an on the go, ready to spray bottle. Multiple Uses: room spray, body spray, ready to spray diffused oils, aromatherapy tool. Ingredients : Essential Oil Blend (vetiver, dill seed, bergamot, lemongrass & ylang ylang), Distilled Water **WARNING** Do not ingest. Keep away from small children. Avoid eye exposure. Keep away from fire. Do not use if allergic to any of the listed essential oils or ingredients. Stop use if irritation occurs.
